title: Account robber PLEASE
body:
Hello
I write with a request, because I was cheated on 16.1.2018 a friend asked about exchanged accounts and offered me an account with 34lvl for 8 lvl I agreed and I write from this account the agreement was such that we change the e-mail in the sense we give the code to change e- mailu.Ja I gave the code and he changed the e-mail and password, but when I wrote that he gave me wrote back bay.Ja I stayed on this without e-mail and can still change my password and other things. Very, I am asking for a refund of my account evidence about my BartiPOv account in the attachment
I am asking for help and writing down. :(
I DO NOT KNOW HOW TO SEND A PICTURE AS A PROOF. I ASK FOR ANSWERING I WOULD NEED TO SEND IT ON MAIL !!!!!!!!
PLEASE HELP ME :(

replies.body: Yikes that sounds pretty tough to have that done by a friend =(. Try not to worry too much, we'll be able to get this straightened out in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Use that link to submit a ticket to our account agents, and do your best to answer the verification questions. After that, they'll be able to help you repair the account and make sure no one else has access.
